page.title: 10Entertainment in Milnathort
page.content: A number of well-known local personalities frequently entertain us in Milnathort Town Hall or in one of the hotels. They include Sandy Dawson (Scottish songs),Gordon Menzies(guitar and vocal), Luis Morton (comic song and poetry), Bill Smith (accordion), John Watt (guitar & vocal) and Tommy Webster (Scottish & Country songs and whistling). Entertainment groups include dance pupils of Mrs Lawson,the young players of Bill Smith's Accordion Band and the choir of Milnathort W.R.I. who perform song, recitation and dance. Both Gordon Menzies and John Watt take part in television and radio broadcasts in Scotland. Most young people, however, find their kind of entertainment in places like Perth or Dunfermline or at home watching television.
